mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.yh_ref_owid AS "yhRefOwid", a.xsxh AS "xsxh", a.zydh_one AS "zydhOne", a.zydh_two AS "zydhTwo", a.zydh_three AS "zydhThree", a.zydh_four AS "zydhFour", a.zydh_five AS "zydhFive", a.zydh_six AS "zydhSix", a.kslb AS "kslb", a.bylb AS "bylb", a.zxdm AS "zxdm", a.zxmc AS "zxmc", a.syddm as "syddm", a.kstc AS "kstc", a.hjqk AS "hjqk", a.sjr AS "sjr", a.tdcj AS "tdcj", a.tdzy AS "tdzy", a.xkkm AS "xkkm", a.yw AS "yw", a.sx AS "sx", a.wy AS "wy", a.wl AS "wl", a.hx AS "hx", a.sw AS "sw", a.zz AS "zz", a.ls AS "ls", a.dl AS "dl", a.js AS "js", a.zhcj AS "zhcj", a.tkmscj AS "tkmscj", a.tkbycj AS "tkbycj", a.tkszcj AS "tkszcj", a.km AS "km", a.pc AS "pc", a.updator AS "updator", a.sg AS "sg", a.tz AS "tz", a.jf AS "jf", a.memo AS "memo", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_studentinfo( owid, yh_Ref_Owid, xsxh, zydh_one, zydh_two, zydh_three, zydh_four, zydh_five, zydh_six, kslb, bylb, zxdm, zxmc, syddm, kstc, hjqk, sjr, tdcj, tdzy, xkkm, yw, sx, wy, wl, hx, sw, zz, ls, dl, js, zhcj, tkmscj, tkbycj, tkszcj, km, pc, updator, sg, tz, jf, memo, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10 ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{yhRefOwid}, #{xsxh}, #{zydhOne}, #{zydhTwo}, #{zydhThree}, #{zydhFour}, #{zydhFive}, #{zydhSix}, #{kslb}, #{bylb}, #{zxdm}, #{zxmc}, #{syddm}, #{kstc}, #{hjqk}, #{sjr}, #{tdcj}, #{tdzy}, #{xkkm}, #{yw}, #{sx}, #{wy}, #{wl}, #{hx}, #{sw}, #{zz}, #{ls}, #{dl}, #{js}, #{zhcj}, #{tkmscj}, #{tkbycj}, #{tkszcj}, #{km}, #{pc}, #{updator}, #{sg}, #{tz}, #{jf}, #{memo}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10} )
